mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guest (name, pw, comments, submitTime) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{comments}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT person_id AS personId, name, pw AS password, comments, submitTime AS date FROM guest
select person_id, name, pw, comments, submitTime from guest where person_id = #{personId}
mapper.update: update person set name = #{name} , pw = #{password} , comments = #{comments} where person_id = #{personId}
